com.kilvish.media

Class BufferedImageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kilvish.media.BufferedImageBuilder

  • public class BufferedImageBuilder
extends Object
    Provides methods to convert a java.awt.Image instance into a java.awt.image.BufferedImage

    • Method Detail

      • bufferImage

        public BufferedImage bufferImage(Image image)
        Returns a BufferedImage with the default settings

      • bufferImage

        public BufferedImage bufferImage(Image image,
                        int type)
        Returns a BufferedImage with the type parameter defined by the user. The default type value is BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB

        private void waitForImage(BufferedImage bufferedImage)
